topics.body:
When you make a villain purely evil, it's hard to stay in character.

Which is why every villain I know in media, it kinda makes me feel sympathy for them since there is always a reason why they're the bad guys.

They might have a bad attitude but that doesn't mean they're evil.
Just antagonists.

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fe888d63687255f6fa1000#post_54fe888d63687255f6fa1000
Thats why Davros is best villain in my opinion. He IS just a bastard. But he has a backstory that explains why. His mother and world molded him into a egotistical monster that cares nothing for anything but furthering hos own goals.

His backstory makes you feel no sympathy for him at all. Just understanding of why he became what he did. Theres no woobie to him, hes just a monster that was sucessfully molded into one.
